title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 51.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 51.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part shall apply to all adjudicatory proceedings to which the Department of Health is a party brought pursuant to the Public Health Law, unless there is a specific statute or regulation to the contrary. This Part shall not apply to proceedings brought pursuant to Part 76, Public Health Administrative Tribunal, of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
51.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
